activities: RadiusPoint will provide invoice management and may receive billing data that includes the employee's name, address, title, corporate email address, corporate address. Additionally the call detail containing calls made to and from the employee or facility.  The information is used solely to allocate or bill back charges on behalf of the client and for the benefit of the employee for tracking and monitoring usage.  The reporting may be emailed to the end user and their manager and can be downloaded from a secure website.  Access to the site is maintained by RadiusPoint and is permission based with access to only those areas and data that has been approved by the corporation.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
